title: Eps. 112 - The Best Day of My Life
description:
This week’s podcast is full of valuable information and it’s spearheaded by Karl. Karl talks about how he’s made the decision to make every day THE BEST DAY OF HIS LIFE. After reviewing the book, “You Are A Badass”, Karl talks extensively about the power that we have. The power to think positively despite our circumstances, the power to focus on what’s important, and most importantly the power to change your life. Not change it next week, tomorrow, or next year, but the power to change it right now. He’s now challenging himself to 100 days of making every day the best day of his life. Are you willing to take the challenge with him ?
 Time Stamped Topics:
  [04:30] - Karl is Unleashed
 [18:36] - Own Your Life
 [29:45] - You Have The Power
 [50:00] - Ask Karl
 [1:07:39] - Karl’s Nugget of The Day
  Listener Perks:
  Organifi is giving our listeners 20% off of their order just use the promo code “SUCCESS”. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime anywhere while on the go.
  Things To Think About:
  “Most people aren’t satisfied with where they are in life, but there is something you can do about it.”
 “As humans we look for events to make us happy.”
 “You have the power to change your focus over any situation in your life right now.”
 “Focus on your heartbeat and it will ease your pain.”
  See ET Live:
  February 25, 2018 Take Control Charlotte

 March 4-11th, 2018  Phenomenal Life Cruise

 March 18, 2018 Take Control Dallas

  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embodies the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.

This week’s podcast is full of valuable information and it’s spearheaded by Karl. Karl talks about how he’s made the decision to make every day THE BEST DAY OF HIS LIFE. After reviewing the book, “You Are A Badass”, Karl talks extensively about the power that we have. The power to think positively despite our circumstances, the power to focus on what’s important, and most importantly the power to change your life. Not change it next week, tomorrow, or next year, but the power to change it right now. He’s now challenging himself to 100 days of making every day the best day of his life. Are you willing to take the challenge with him ?

  • [18:36] - Own Your Life
